item.title: AI in Education - Some food for thought
item.description: What are we supposed to do about GenAI in (mathematical) education? Many of us have been wrestling with it over the past few months. I certainly don’t have a definitive answer, but it’s a topic that demands we share what we’re thinking and what we’re seeing. If anything, it may bring a felt and needed opportunity to finally be able to rethink and reshape the way our education is organized. We discussed this in less uncertain times both in It’s Not Just Numbers and various episodes of Degrees of Freedom, our podcasts on mathematics and education respectively.
